title: RIOT FIX THE QUEUE BUG
body: BEEN WAITING FOR ALMOST 2 HOURS JUST TO FIND A NORMAL GAME. WTF IS THIS BUG SO ANNOYING

replies.body: Same boat here. Been in normal queue since 3pm est time. I just started playing league 3 days ago and this is a really bad first impression. Soon I will have to give up and go make dinner for the family.

Sorry dude :( Our network team is on this right now working on a fix. Looks like something happened on the back end. Can keep track of updates on our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page
